item.title: Olympic : Rshiny Approach
item.description: Introduction Material Useful for Rsiny Development How To Use The Olympic Rshiny App ? Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4 Step 5 Step 6 Step 7 Step 8 Introduction Rshiny is very popular in the rstats community. The glamourous interface and functionality has helped for this level of popularity. In perspective of using an Rshiny App anyone can use it with minimal amount of knowledge.
